short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrape email addresses from visited pages. Email finder to efficiently gather leads!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Email Sweeper is the ultimate solution for email outreach! This Chrome extension simplifies the tedious task of collecting email addresses by allowing you to scrape emails from web pages you visit. With Email Sweeper, you can export the collected email addresses to CSV, making it easy to organize your email lists and streamline your outreach strategy.

Email Sweeper helps you save time and effort by scraping multiple email addresses at once, eliminating the need for manual collection and helping you find emails. This makes it an ideal tool for digital marketers, sales teams, recruiters, and anyone who needs to conduct email outreach.

Email Sweeper's advanced features ensure that you can quickly and accurately collect the email addresses you need, giving you a competitive edge in your outreach efforts.

Features:
- Scrape emails from pages you visit
- Export scraped emails to CSV so you can open in Excel
- Advanced filtering technology
- Easy-to-use interface
- Fast and friendly support

If you're looking for a reliable and efficient email finder and scraper tool, look no further than Email Sweeper. Get the extension now and take your email outreach to the next level!
